spec.description: Desired state of the BBBFrontend resource.

credentials.description: Predefined credentials for the B3scale instance

secretRef.description: SecretRef is a reference to a key in a Secret resource containing the key to connect to the BBB instance.

key.description: The key of the entry in the Secret resource's `data` field to be used.

name.description: Name of the resource being referred to. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/names/#names

deletionProtection.description: Protect BBB frontend resource from deletion in b3scale API

frontendID.description: Unique BBB frontend ID generated by the b3scale API during creation

settings.description: Settings defines the B3Scale instance settings

status.description: Status of the BBBFrontend. This is set and managed automatically.

conditions.description: List of status conditions to indicate the status of the BBB frontend. Known condition types are `Ready`.

items.description: BBBFrontendCondition contains condition information for an BBBFrontend.

lastTransitionTime.description: LastTransitionTime is the timestamp corresponding to the last status change of this condition.

message.description: Message is a human readable description of the details of the last transition, complementing reason.

observedGeneration.description: If set, this represents the .metadata.generation that the condition was set based upon. For instance, if .metadata.generation is currently 12, but the .status.condition[x].observedGeneration is 9, the condition is out of date with respect to the current state of the BBBFrontend.

reason.description: Reason is a brief machine readable explanation for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status of the condition, one of (`True`, `False`, `Unknown`).

type.description: Type of the condition, known values are (`Ready`).
